item.description: A new way to do things

item.title: Curriculum vitae (CV)
item.description: Education: Ph.D. Electrical Engineering, Florida State University, GPA: 3.8, December 2020. Dissertation Title: Graph search-based management of distributed energy resources and coordinated voltage control. M.Sc. Electrical Engineering, Florida State University, GPA: 3.8, December 2018. B.Sc. Electrical and Electronic Engineering, American International University Bangladesh (AIUB), GPA: 3.92, May 2015. Research Interests: Power system modeling and simulation. Optimization, machine learning and artificial intelligence.
